categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Crolar was a male of unidentified species, reaching a height of three feet. This person was seen in Depatar, the City of Masks, in 31 BBY. Like all the visitors and many inhabitants, this person was in disguise, particularly with a tray on his head. This allowed him to watch the girls' legs without their consents. Sometimes, an unaware dancer laid a cup on Crolar's tray, and then Crolar moved away and drank it for free.
